Title:
Ganoderma leucocontextus, a new member of Ganoderma lucidum
complex from Tibet of China
Abstract:
A new species Ganoderma leucocontextus, discovered from
Bomi County in Tibet Autonomous Region of China, is formally introduced.
The main distinctive characters of the new species are the combination
of its G. lucidum-like appearance, white context and the habitat on
deciduous wood. Phylogenetic analysis of the new species and related
taxa based on the internal transcribed spacer (ITS) sequences is
provided.
